00239 inline
00240 bool
00241 operator == ( const sc_fxtype_params& a, const sc_fxtype_params& b )
00242 {

00245              a.m_q_mode == b.m_q_mode &&

00250 inline
00251 bool
00252 operator != ( const sc_fxtype_params& a, const sc_fxtype_params& b )
00253 {
00254     return ( a.m_wl     != b.m_wl     ||
00255              a.m_iwl    != b.m_iwl    ||
00256              a.m_q_mode != b.m_q_mode ||
00257              a.m_o_mode != b.m_o_mode ||
